name: Cruasaders Cut
description:
Cruasaders Cut is my first game. This is a 2D Pixel-Art Dungeon Crawler game. When you play it, please keep in mind that it was created by 14 YEARS OLD BOY FROM CZECH REPUBLIC. I'm still learning programming, so I'm going to be better still, so please patience. If you liked the game do not forget to write a review (or you could give it a donate). P.S. This is the translation of Google Translate, so please excuse me for any errors.
Moving - W, S, A, D
Attack - Mouse0
Pause Menu - esc
I'm still working on this game so expect updates in the future!
And first update is here!
-added Score system
-added Victory screen
-new enemies
-new camera view
-traps
-level unlocking system
-level nubers
-bug fixes
